00022 /// @defgroup cpDampedRotarySpring cpDampedRotarySpring
00023 /// @{
00024 
00025 typedef cpFloat (*cpDampedRotarySpringTorqueFunc)(struct cpConstraint *spring, cpFloat relativeAngle);
00026 
00027 const cpConstraintClass *cpDampedRotarySpringGetClass();
00028 
00029 typedef struct cpDampedRotarySpring {
00030         cpConstraint constraint;
00031         cpFloat restAngle;
00032         cpFloat stiffness;
00033         cpFloat damping;
00034         cpDampedRotarySpringTorqueFunc springTorqueFunc;
00035         
00036         cpFloat target_wrn;
00037         cpFloat w_coef;
00038         
00039         cpFloat iSum;
00040 } cpDampedRotarySpring;
00041 
00042 /// Allocate a damped rotary spring.
00043 cpDampedRotarySpring *cpDampedRotarySpringAlloc(void);
00044 /// Initialize a damped rotary spring.
00045 cpDampedRotarySpring *cpDampedRotarySpringInit(cpDampedRotarySpring *joint, cpBody *a, cpBody *b, cpFloat restAngle, cpFloat stiffness, cpFloat damping);
00046 /// Allocate and initialize a damped rotary spring.
00047 cpConstraint *cpDampedRotarySpringNew(cpBody *a, cpBody *b, cpFloat restAngle, cpFloat stiffness, cpFloat damping);
00048 
00049 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpDampedRotarySpring, cpFloat, restAngle, RestAngle);
00050 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpDampedRotarySpring, cpFloat, stiffness, Stiffness);
00051 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpDampedRotarySpring, cpFloat, damping, Damping);
00052 CP_DefineConstraintProperty(cpDampedRotarySpring, cpDampedRotarySpringTorqueFunc, springTorqueFunc, SpringTorqueFunc);
00053 
00054 /// @}
